job_tasks.phrase: manage large data-sets of audio-video data
job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly refers to managing large datasets, which is a core aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: set up a world class data function
job_tasks.justification: Setting up a data function implies the design and implementation of data processes and infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: managing a lake with PB scale data
job_tasks.justification: Managing a data lake with petabyte scale data is a significant data engineering responsibility.
This phrase explicitly mentions building data pipelines, a key component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: set up and provide data management for our ML teams
job_tasks.justification: Providing data management and setup for ML teams falls under data engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: set up our audio-video data pipeline for the Video team
job_tasks.justification: This is a specific instance of building and setting up a data pipeline.

job_tasks.phrase: speech data pipeline for the Voice team
job_tasks.justification: Another specific instance of building and setting up a data pipeline.

job_tasks.phrase: Data storage - our data lake for large scale audio-visual datasets
job_tasks.justification: Managing data storage, especially a data lake, is a fundamental data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Data sources - set up our ingest process, working with external data providers
job_tasks.justification: Setting up data ingestion processes is a crucial part of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Data annotation - manage data verification and annotation, working with external providers
job_tasks.justification: Managing data annotation and verification, especially with external providers, is part of data preparation and engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines - deploy custom ML data transformations, working with our ML teams
job_tasks.justification: Deploying data transformations within pipelines is a core data engineering activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Data access - create transient data-sets on demand to support ML model training
job_tasks.justification: Creating data access mechanisms and datasets for ML training is a data engineering function.

job_tasks.phrase: Data tracking - usage tracking and monitoring across all data sources
job_tasks.justification: Tracking and monitoring data usage across sources is a data governance and engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: supporting 7+ teams developing cutting edge solutions in generative video synthesis
job_tasks.justification: While the role is primarily DataOps/Engineering, it directly supports teams developing generative solutions, implying an understanding of the modeling context.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy custom ML data transformations, working with our ML teams
job_tasks.justification: This indicates collaboration with ML teams on transformations, which are closely related to model development.
This phrase clearly states the objective of supporting ML model training, linking the role to the modeling lifecycle.
While general, in the context of supporting ML teams and their data, this implies enabling and accelerating their work, aligning with MLOps goals.

classification.rationale: The role is heavily focused on managing large datasets, building complex data pipelines, and providing data infrastructure to support ML teams. While it mentions supporting generative synthesis, the core responsibilities and tasks align strongly with Data Engineering and MLOps principles, which are central to the ML Engineer profile's ability to productionize models by ensuring robust data handling.
